color.html.title: Colors
color.html.contents: $brand-colors (Map) scss $brand-colors: ( '_brand-main': hsl(195, 52%, 31%), '_brand-accent': hsl(330, 100%, 45%) ( 'shade': 25% #000, ), '_brand-gray': '#_brand-main' ( 'desaturate': 90%, ), ); The brand is defined by our primary brand blue, along with secondary pink and orange base colors. Color Previews _brand-main #266478 rgb(38, 100, 120) hsl(195, 52%, 31%) _brand-accent #ad0056 rgb(173, 0, 86) hsl(330, 100%, 34%) _brand-gray #4f4f4f rgb(79, 79, 79) hsl(0, 0%, 31%) $shade-colors (Map) scss $shade-colors: shades-of($brand-colors, 5); Tints and shades of the brand colors. _brand-gray-dark-3 #4f4f4f rgb(79, 79, 79) hsl(0, 0%, 31%) _brand-gray-dark-2 #5a5a5a rgb(90, 90, 90) hsl(0, 0%, 35%) _brand-gray-dark-1 #6f6f6f rgb(111, 111, 111) hsl(0, 0%, 44%) _brand-gray-0 #848484 rgb(132, 132, 132) hsl(0, 0%, 52%) _brand-gray-light-1 #9a9a9a rgb(154, 154, 154) hsl(0, 0%, 60%) _brand-gray-light-2 #afafaf rgb(175, 175, 175) hsl(0, 0%, 69%) _brand-gray-light-3 #c4c4c4 rgb(196, 196, 196) hsl(0, 0%, 77%) _brand-gray-light-4 #dadada rgb(218, 218, 218) hsl(0, 0%, 85%) _brand-gray-light-5 #efefef rgb(239, 239, 239) hsl(0, 0%, 94%) $contrast-colors (Map) scss $contrast-colors: ( '_contrast-light': color('#_brand-gray-light-5'), '_contrast-dark': color('#_brand-main-dark-5'), ); The light and dark contrast colors act as the high and low range of our palette. These colors should not be dynamic. Color Previews _contrast-light #efefef rgb(239, 239, 239) hsl(0, 0%, 94%) _contrast-dark #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%) $theme-colors (Map) scss $theme-colors: ( 'background': '#_contrast-light', 'text': '#_contrast-dark', 'text-light': '#_brand-main-dark-2', 'border': '#_brand-gray-0', 'border-light': '#_brand-gray-light-1', 'action': '#_brand-accent-dark-2', 'action-hover': '#_brand-accent-dark-4', ); Main theme colors will be set as relative CSS variables – applying the above colors to more specific use-cases. This map should not include any color-adjustments. Color Previews background #efefef rgb(239, 239, 239) hsl(0, 0%, 94%) text #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%) text-light #326c7f rgb(50, 108, 127) hsl(195, 44%, 35%) border #7f7f7f rgb(127, 127, 127) hsl(0, 0%, 50%) border-light #939393 rgb(147, 147, 147) hsl(0, 0%, 58%) action #b10e5f rgb(177, 14, 95) hsl(330, 85%, 37%) action-hover #89074c rgb(137, 7, 76) hsl(328, 90%, 28%) $invert-colors (Map) scss $invert-colors: ( 'background': '#_contrast-dark', 'text': '#_contrast-light', 'text-light': '#_brand-main-light-2', 'border': '#_brand-gray-0', 'border-light': '#_brand-gray-dark-1', 'action': '#_brand-accent-light-3', 'action-hover': '#_brand-accent-light-4', ); Inverted theme colors for light-on-dark mode. This map should not include any color-adjustments. Color Previews background #0d2128 rgb(13, 33, 40) hsl(196, 51%, 10%) text #efefef rgb(239, 239, 239) hsl(0, 0%, 94%) text-light #94b0b9 rgb(148, 176, 185) hsl(195, 21%, 65%) border #7f7f7f rgb(127, 127, 127) hsl(0, 0%, 50%) border-light #6c6c6c rgb(108, 108, 108) hsl(0, 0%, 42%) action #d99fbc rgb(217, 159, 188) hsl(330, 43%, 74%) action-hover #e1bccf rgb(225, 188, 207) hsl(329, 38%, 81%)

fonts.html.title: Fonts
fonts.html.contents: Font Configuration Related Accoutrement Type [external] $system-font scss $system-font: ( 'name': 'system', 'stack': ( 'system-ui', 'sans-serif', ), '300': ( 'local': $_system-local, ), ); Font Preview system css font-family: system, system-ui, sans-serif;

index.html.title: Miriam Suzanne Documentation
index.html.contents: View Project mia eleventy source for miriamsuzanne.com Develop: Install dependencies: yarn Compile and run Eleventy server, with a watcher for Sass files: gulp The site will be compiled into _site/ for simple gh-pages deployment, and the served site will be available at localhost:8080 or e.g. mia.hexxie.com:8080. You can also run individual commands: # build the static site gulp build # run the server gulp serve # minify images gulp imagemin # compile sass gulp sass # lint sass gulp sasslint # format sass gulp prettier # compile sass docs gulp sassdoc # watch sass files (lint & docs & compile) gulp watch Sass Docs are compiled into the _site/style/ folder, which is then available at the URL: /style/.

scale.html.title: Ratios & Sizes
scale.html.contents: Scale Settings Related Accoutrement Scale [external] $modular-scale scss $modular-scale: ( 'text-ratio': 1.6, ); Ratio text-ratio (1.6) Step Value -3 0.24 -2 0.39 -1 0.63 — base 1 1.6 2 2.56 3 4.1 $text-sizes scss $text-sizes: ( 'root': 16px, 'responsive': calc(%s + %s) ( '%s': '#root' 0.25vw, ), 'large': 1rem ( 'text-ratio': 0.5, ), 'xlarge': calc(%s + %s) ( '%s': '#large' 0.75vw, ), 'small': 1rem ( 'text-ratio': -0.5, ), 'xsmall': 1rem ( 'text-ratio': -1, ), ); Size Previews Name Value root 16px Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. responsive calc(16px + 0.25vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. large 1.2649110641rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. xlarge calc(1.2649110641rem + 0.75vw) Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. small 0.790569415rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. xsmall 0.625rem Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. $spacing-sizes scss $spacing-sizes: ( 'rhythm': '#root' ( 'text-ratio': 1, 'convert-units': 'rem', ), 'gutter': '#rhythm', 'double-gutter': '#gutter' ( 'times': 2, ), 'spacer': calc(%s + %s) ( '%s': '#double-gutter' 4vmin, ), 'shim': '#gutter' ( 'times': 0.5, ), 'half-shim': '#shim' ( 'times': 0.5, ), 'quarter-shim': '#shim' ( 'times': 0.25, ), ); Size Previews Name Value rhythm, gutter 1.6rem double-gutter 3.2rem spacer calc(3.2rem + 4vmin) shim 0.8rem half-shim 0.4rem quarter-shim 0.2rem $component-sizes scss $component-sizes: ( 'icon': 1em, ); Size Previews Name Value icon 1em $page-sizes scss $page-sizes: ( 'page': 42rem, ); Size Previews Name Value page 42rem $break-sizes scss $break-sizes: ( 'page-break': '#page' ( 'times': 2, 'convert-units': 'browser-ems', ), );
